item.description:
Alliance Management: Avoiding Pitfalls and Collaborating for Success When: February 28, 2012 Where: Genzyme Center, Roscoe Brady Lecture Hall, 500 Kendall Street, Cambridge, MA Register: http://www.hbanet.org (go to events) Agenda:
5:30 PM - 6:30 PM Registration and Networking
6:30 PM - 6:40 PM Welcome / Opening Remarks / Introduction of Speakers
6:40 PM - 8:00 PM Panel Discussion
8:00 PM - 8:15 PM Closing Remarks
8:15 PM - 9:00 PM Networking This program will involve a discussion of the importance of alliances (partnerships, collaborations, mergers, etc) and how best to manage them from initiation to successful conclusion. Speakers from alliance management and business development will describe why these partnerships are significant for a companies' overall growth. They will share their experiences, including what to do and what not to do.The learning objectives of this program are to learn what characteristics are attractive for an alliance or partnership, identify common issues for a failed partnership, and discover important factors for ensuring a successful collaboration.
item.name: Alliance Management: Avoiding Pitfalls and Collaborating for Success
